title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added and the data set is not set, the group dialog does not appear as expected.
OB: The group dialog does not appear when attempting to create a new table group without setting the data set.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if the data set is not set, allowing the user to create a new table group.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table report item to the report.
2. Do not set the data set for the table report item.
3. Try to create a new table group and observe that the group dialog does not appear.
